No. 208612)} Sub: Revised Guidelines for   Project Alignment and Land Acquisition Plan  (LAP) approvals through Data Lake -reg: Ref:: MoRTH SOP and Checklist dated 20.09.2024 NHAI Policy Guideline No. 7.1.82 dated 24.01.2025 jii) MoRTH Letter No. 24028/04/2025-H dated 10.03.2025 This is in reference to NHAI Policy Guideline No_ 7.1.82 dated 24.01.2025, which prescribes the Procedure for approval of Alignment and Land Acquisition Plans (LAPs) for Projects delegated to NHAI including Brownfield Projects and Brownfield expansions where the realignment is less than 10 km or 20% of the Project length whichever is lower. 2. Subsequently, MoRTH vide its letter dated 10.03.2025, has issued certain modifications in the Procedure for approval of Alignments in cases involving a combination of Greenfield and Brownfield Projects or Brownfield   expansions. These modifications shall now be applicable to the Alignment and LAP approval process for all relevant National Highway Projects. 3. Approvals: a. For Projects falling under Para (i) of the above MoRTH letter, alignment approval shall be accorded by the Concerned Member. b. For Projects falling under Para (ii) , approval shall be granted by the Land Acquisition Committee (LAC) comprising the Chairman, Concerned Member and Member (A)_ In both cases, the proposal shall be processed by the concerned Technical Division on the Datalake Portal without referring it to the LA Division. 4 The   approved Alignment cases with necessary details and their LAPs-whether approved by MoRTH or the Concerned Member or LAC must be uploaded to the Data Lake Platform. The LA Division shall refer to these uploaded LAPs while processing 3(a)/ 3A/ 3D Notifications through the Bhoomirashi Portal. For this purpose, the LAP must be submitted in GIS Format: 5 However , any relaxation on submitting GIS-based LAPs   should be  supported by necessary  Acceptance/ Approval of Member concerned for 3A Notifications and of the Chairman for 3D Notifications Subject to MoRTHs acceptance Contd__2I - e NHAL 06th
